title: I tried to tell riot their cilent is lagging out because of TFT
body:
Riot is stopping me from posting whats wrong with LOL because they know I am right.... I can't even edit my ticket because they suddenly need me to verify my email again. TFT is the reason worlds lagged out its the reason I lag out and it is the reason you are lagging out. If they do not remove TFT we all suffer.





1. ~~_****_~~

replies.body: Technical explanation or GTFO, because that makes zero sense.
